duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead Purchasing Projects that could impact multiple corporate facilities and develop Should Be Cost of components within assigned commodity.
Evaluate Supplier Quotation Cost Breakdown Details and develop negotiation strategy.

Research and understand market trends, create a Benchmark on assigned commodities, create a Make –vs- Buy analysis, evaluation of Localization/LCC/Mexico sourcing, and comprehend the impact of technology on the product.
Create the Commodity Strategy for Key Commodities, evaluate commodity and suppliers to determine the type of agreement required, and negotiate and implement the decided level of the contract.
Identify cost reduction activities from the product design stage through the production life of the product purchased.
Lead negotiations with suppliers, support Buyer P3 and P4 levels, mentor new employees, and provide guidance to other levels on assignments, projects, or negotiations.
Support Supplier Advancement Engineer in VA/VE and Kaizen supplier workshops, provide management of Supplier Risk, and Quarterly reporting of KPIs to each Key Supplier.
Frequent travel to suppliers (international travel a possibility) and generate a map of Supplier Processes including Bekido and Chokko rates at time of quotation.
Work overtime as required, occasional Saturdays and/or Sundays when directed, and ensure thorough understanding of JNA Purchasing Policies and Procedures.
Perform other duties as assigned by Purchasing Manager.

education_certification.credential: 4 Year College Degree with Focus in Business Administration, Accounting, or Engineering. Requires 3+ Years Automotive Direct Material Purchasing Experience
